Blog.post: today is better than yesterday... the annoyin customer came back!... *hehehe* and I did the sale... eventhough i had to run around and around and around..... aniweis... have u ever learned how to fly? Me my self... i believe i can fly.. coz all my dream is always about flying.. but today.. i watched a lil birdie - which was found by Daniel - learned to fly... *we really dunno if she or he is a gurl or a boy* we named her or him UWI... so cute... aniweissss... found out sumthin... that it aint easy to learn to fly... even for a bird... needs lotsa practices.. and guts as well.... i guess that is sumthin that we can copy... any new things we try to do... no matter how hard it is.. if we put our effort into it and keep on tryin ... we will be succeed! * thx for UWI*

There is only one kind of successful negotiation......it is the kind where both parties come out ahead..... I really do not like using the word "win" because that implies a game of some sort where there are winners and losers...... negotiation occurs everywhere in life and life is not a game....2 be a successful negotiator....you must have the other person's interests in mind as well as your own.....

To all my dearest friend..... when it comes to the other person's character and personal habits, make sure you can live with these as they are now..and if u cant be happy with the person the way he or she is now, dont pretend that ur happy with him or her... one of the biggest crime in this world is being cruel to ur own feeling...!

feel like cryin....!!!!....being so nice to people sumtimes can be really hectic.. coz what happen is.. they will easily muck around with ur time.. and feeling...... and after a whole day dealin with all this matter... and what u wanna do is just take a deep breath and relax for a while.... they still expect u to give them the best u can give without knowing that what they do to u is a waste of time... and CORRUPTION OF EMOTION!... i dunno what the hell is that.. but it's just dat.. i feel like im being used..... *huaaaaaaaaaa* hiks hiks... but this wont stop me from being nice... i know sumtimes it feels fake when u have to be nice while u're actually feel sick of being nice... but at least by being nice.. will make the world be friendly back to me...!

Happy Eid!!!!!.....The winning day for us!!!!.... Just like what i have forwarded to every number in my add book... Let's push rewind, reverse and drive away and see all the mistakes disappear in our rearview... Let's start forgivin b4 we'll be running outta time.. but wait a second... is it only bout forgiving and being forgiven..??? it's more than that.. coz that is sumthin that we can do everyday without waiting for this holy day...It's about EATING! *LOL* naaah not that one as well... what i like about today... the gathering... laughter and joy.. all blends togetha... forget all the sadness for a moment... well it's sumthin that u can also do everyday though... is just that this time has a different meaning.. i cant really explain what sort of feelin i have that make this day is so special to me... maybe tomorrow... too tired to think..... to selfish to share? hehehhe ;P
love ur friends while u can still love them! *comes from the deepest of my heart*

been workin hard lately.. take ova the shop... bit hectic... lotsa fun.. especially if u reach the target... aniweis.. satisfaction and happiness... which one comes first? and which one u after? to me... they should come togetha.. but i know that sumtimes i have to be realistic... that sumtimes happiness and satisfaction do not come togetha.... and sumtimes they dont even get along!.... ok u feel happy because u pass the exam.. but u're not satisfied with the grade... that's one of the example..or... u can feel that ur body is shakin bcoz u're experiencing an enormous satisfaction... but then at the end u dont feel happy at all... well for me happiness and satisfaction comes togetha is like when i feel so bad about sumthin that i say or i do to sumone and i feel so bad so that i have to ask for an apologize.. and then when u say sorry from the deepest of your heart.. and the person that u feel bad to... trully forgive you and say "I forgive u" with a smile... and that smile warms ur heart.. that's when i feel both satisfaction and happiness.. that's one of a small example...there's a lot more.. Afterall, life is all about risks and it requires you to jump. No matter which one should come first...don't be a person who has to look back and wonder what they would have done, or could have had *hehehe nyambung ga sih*.... btw topic taken from the convey between Mr. SokTau and Mr.TakeiTEasy... hehehehhe thx guyz....

just finished all the exam! finally! it's time for holideiiiii... :) yippee *alangkah senangnyah* hehehehe.. but wait.. lotsa people think that this is not the right time to think about holidei.. it's too sooon they said.. it's actually the moment of waitin... waitin for sumthin that doesnt even exist.. ? hehehe... they'll kill me if they know i make fun of this... i guess what they're tryin to say is that... we'd better prepare ourself for the worst thing that might happen.... which is FAIL from the exam!!!!... hmm i kinda agree though... but it's just that what's wrong for having some fun after exam week... it's sort of the way of releasing stress... let's not forget the minimum sleep hours during the exam week..red eyes.. numb brain.. COME ON!!!... i need to have some fun!... we did what we could... we did the best we could do.. just dont forget to pray... but dat doesnt forbid us from getting pampered? rite? live the life today as maximum as u can... u're free to do anything!....AND "fuck the pesimist!" (quoted from pearl jam).. excuse ma language

have u ever felt really uncomfortable in front of the person u just met? it's not an okay feeling i guess... no matter how far u try to get to know her/him... it just doesnt feel right.. then it makes u feel unsecure.. *sigh*... so the question is... how d'ya deal with it? just do what u have to do and dont take everythin she or he does personal?.. or take her/him to the arena? and do the one on one battle.. let some of your kungfu styles out.. :) i choose the last one.. the worst likely scenario... there will be an argument.. but then u just dont wanna be a hypocrite...and again all i want is just tryin to be honest by sayin what i really feel.. and hope that it will sort everything out...

hello world?:) sumone's bday today.. gettin old.. is that what everybody wants... old = mature? i dun think so...it has got nuthin to do wit age i suppose.. it's bout experiences and backgrounds... pasca divorce.. tends to build some internal strenght... a resistance of reality might as well occur but at the end.. it's a process of being ourself... we tend to develop ourself... infected by the condition that surround us..
woke up wit a smile.. today is a beautiful day.. what is a beautiful day? and why sumtimes we have a bad day? a beautiful day exists when we say to ourself that today is gonna be a beautiful day..
damn my exam.. cmon.. keep blamin on my exam.. dat's right! it's always the pattern we choose.. blaming on sumthin else while actually the mistake is on us..

Laughin at people.. that's easy and probably sumthin that we do everyday.. if sumthin's funny we laugh right? i suppose we should laugh.. but laughin at ur stoopidity.. YOURS not theirs.. sumtimes isnt funny anymore.. admit it.. if u do sumthin funny (accidentally).. ppl will laugh at u.. and u'll feel ashamed.. angry probably? Somehow, it's hard to laugh at ur own mistake... but i found out that laughin at urself means u will be able to see urself from other ppl's view.. and that helps u to build a positive energy..
Struggling hard to sign out.. i have to .. but what has to be done usually never be done.. that's the case!

The first post is always -not always- the freshest one.. u reckon? i dun think so.. see it's all about mind games and about time management... why is that so? dunno.. well one thing i know u will spend lots of time typing all these words if u have enough time.. but if u are controlled by time... then goodbye...

It's nearly nu yer now.. Hope u guys spend it with those u love! The New Year has always been a time for looking back to the past, and more importantly, forward to the coming year. It's time to reflect on the changes we want, or need, if we're to have the motivation move forward. It is having sumthin old.. and making it a lil bit better.. or way so much better.. or to have sumthin new.. and decide to keep it and believe in it.. if u have nu yer's resolution, try to stay with it.. or if u have to break it, break it with pride.. aniweis.. stop talkin too much yacko! heuheuehhe HAPPEEEE NU YEEEEEER!!!!!!!

finally back to shitney.. which i think still the most beautiful city i love... :) but many thx to melbern and indi! *just be creative always ok bro!* :) and glad to see adi again.. on the way back to sydney.. starboy has a bit of problem with his tummy.. so we had to open the window again and again and again.. ! heuheuheuhehe... guyz thx for the road trip.. for everything!

finally i have decided... wanna get a tattoo! it's a big decision i know.. coz this is sumthin that i will keep foreva... and i dont want to regret it later on.. and one thing i know I LOVE MY MUM! SOO MUCH... u hear me mum? heuheuhuehuhe *ga nyambung yah* i luv her for being her! u rock mum! aniweis.. back to tattoo again.. still deciding what design to put.. and where should i place it...
still thinkin.....
still thinkin... and browsing for jewels and what sort of piercin...
thinkin to get anotha piercin...

im starviiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiing.............. but too lazy to go out ! the boyz in da hood are still sleepin... with numerous position.. some weird.. some so sweet.. or pretend to be so sweet? *alias sok imut*.... what's gud for boys for being sok imut aniweis? hmm they can use it as a way to attract gurl's attention.. gurl usually say *oooh so sweeeeeettt * or *lutunnaaaahh* but beware guyz.. after a while jadinya hiperbola banget!!! and the gurl will say... *ooh u're so gay!* heuheuheuheue.... either u wanna take that as a compliment or else .. is up to ya... heuheuhuehe oiss out!

last nite rite at about 2400 hours went for Lord of The Rings: The return of da king... tried so hard to stay awake.. the first 15 minutes was struggling so hard though.. fortunately didnt miss the battle at all.. the ghost army was way sooo kewl...!!! but i know if i see them face to face i'll be scared to death... !!!! hmm one of the gud ending movies....

im in melbourne now.. after 10 hours road trip... with bayu, daniel and miji.... it was along way down!... of a roller coaster! heuheuhe well actually arrived yesterday mornin.. then went ot while the boys were sleepin.. joined the massive crowd of the boxing day... found sumthin for my mum... and then.. went to chapel st... was about to queue the lord of the ring.. but ever show was sold out! *oooh shit* ... akhirnya ngupi2 di Capelise.. tattoo photos! heuheuheuh i will upload them sumtimes tomoro maybe.. then heading back to Indi's apt.. life is dinamically changin all the time.. three of my good friends are about to tie the knot soon... two other good friends just recently gained their master degree....other two good friends are nearly finished.... another good friend of mine is a diplomat now... and the other one is busy behind the computer.... just wanna say to all of them... wish u luck in every way... and success always ..............miss u a looooot!!!!...

got new piercings!... just like a human being... piercings also have ups and downs.. i've been through the downs for the last couple of days... and i think they're in a healing process now... hopefully :) aniweis... new year is coming soooooonn!!!!!!............

at the moment im still thinkin of a good reason to make up our own mind.. dunno why... it feels really difficult to make up our own mind.. ok here's the case... we have promised to ourself that we wont do this or do that.. but at the end there's always sum excuse to break the promises and act like nuthin happens.. but after a while ... we begin to regret what we have done...*ooh shit*... hehehhe... sooo... still tryin to find a gud reason.... get back to ya soon... piss out!

to prove dat u're not a playa.. is not to be a playa.. but the question now... will they believe u? will they accept it just like dat? damn! trust is sumthin dat is very hard to get...

maybe.. im too happy maybe... im to excited... maybe... im exaggerating too much... maybe..
never been like dis before... never been happy like dis before.. never been so excited like dis before... never been... never....

being a fool sumtimes is okay.... i mean fool in terms of freshman...coz at the start of our trip, u feel like a newborn - fresh, open and spontaneous and that we are ready to conquer the world.... however we have to be aware with lots of obtacles out there...
only with ur heart u would truly see coz the most important things are not visible to the eyes...
worried.... kinda worried.... pls no no.... i hope it wont happen....

for my friend who likes to be alone at the moment... i'll give u sum time to ease ur mind... for my friend who's feelin down at the moment... i'll still be here incase u need me... for my friend during the darkest day..... i'll bright ur day...
adi.... get well soon... sorry that this deadly virus is so contagious... im sad... hiks...

feel a demon about to explode at anytime... can u beat the demon inside ur body? everybody has a demon inside... and that this demon can come out whenever they want... turn u into a nightmare... i guess it's okay for us to sumtimes release this demon... let their anger burst out...
went for a movie.. love actually... is all around? i dont think it's around me....anymo..
she was blurry... or was it my vision?
just saw a good looking gurl sumwhere.... and i think i am a lesbian... am i?
hei shit happens!... all the time... u just have to get ready for it... but the thing is dat... u cannot be ready for it... u cannot! at least be prepared perhaps? but naaaah... im outtie....
is it fair? that u know sum people... and they know u but they actually dont wanna get to know u.. while u actually wanna get to know them... replacement happens!...
have i ever done this..... have i ever done that? did i really do this.... did i really do that? U can never tell!....
to learn is to read... to learn is to practice... to learn is to make mistake... to learn is to tell... to learn is to discuss... u live and u learn....

kinda hard to explain the feeling i hav at the moment.... during the darkest moment u hav... generally people claim that they dont see any lights... but i see them... they're just there!.. all u do is just open ur eyes...and run... run to them... dont just stare at them... do sumthin!
all i need is just that sumthin to hold onto...
now and dreams we run.....

believe or not to believe in sumone.... u never know whether they're saying is right or not... u never know if they lie about sumthin... u never know.... but never stop believin ur self!... if u can't believe in sumone... the least u can do is believin urself..
log in.... and log out.. like u ain't got anythin better to do...

yesterday... a deep convey about sum theory of relationships... everyday we learn sumthin bout love... everyday we're tryin to figure it out.. to know what love is... is it like life and death experience? why use the word life instead of birth? birth is the opposite of death... not life... life has no opposite!... life is life... and live ur life to the max... !

is it true? that ur heart is beating faster when u meet sumone u like...
is it true? that if u need sum help then u hav to offer them a reward?......
i need sum light.... i need sum lampu!.... huaaaaaaaaaaaaa

here i am again... in front of the monitor.... wondering that it's funny how people sumtimes can easily change their mind without thinkin any further... that any other person involve in their decision can be really affected... in a positive way and in a negative way...
happpeee betsssdeiii shiiiennntaaaahhh!!!!!....... :) :) :)

Hello there, the angel from my nightmare..The shadow in the background of the morgue...The unsuspecting victim of darkness in the valley....We can live like Jack and Sally if we want ....Where you can always find me....We'll have Halloween on Christmas....And in the night we'll wish this never ends....We'll wish this never ends.....Where are you and I'm so sorry....I cannot sleep I cannot dream tonight.....I need somebody and always.....This sick strange darkness comes creeping on so haunting every time......And as I stared I counted webs from all the spiders.....Catching things and eating their insides....Like indecision to call you and hear your voice of treason....Will you come home and stop this pain tonight.....Stop this pain tonight.....Don't waste your time on me you're already The voice inside my head (miss you miss you)
it's really hot in here... !!!!! i need some fresh air!

today i spent ma day watching movies... movies and movies... she's all that, bad company and meet joe black... plus with ice cream and bread, m&ms, doritos, pad thai... and all other junk food... whatta day :) thx for makin ma day boyz!

it's funny how people have set up a plan on their mind.... but at the end all they can say that "hey it's just a plan!" and there's no realization at all for the plan... but hang on... it's not becoz of them... it's sumthin that we actually dont think about... it's what u call destiny...*i guess?* no matter how good the plan u have but if ur destiny says that the plan doesnt work... then it doesnt work... it's unavoidable!... it's sumthin that's just not meant to be... it's not that we choose not to be... but it's just have not to be!... so not be it!... and that we can not do anythin about it...

anotha weekend... still cant spent it outside... still need sumtimeto heal this chicken pox on ma body and ma back.. evry chick pox on ma face has already dried... leavin me with lots of black spot.. which i hope will be gone sooon...
btw Miji bday yesterday... he blew the candle last nite while he was here... sorry ji.. no proper cake.. :) wish u all the happiness in this life! go miji go miji! :)
I thank God for the beautiful friends i have.... thx for taking care of me while im in my downs.. :) and for Lampu thx for being so patient...

*sigh* nevermind... there's always a good reason behind all of this.. it's just that try to find a positive side while u're in the middle of negative things is not always easy... perhaps this is the way that God reminds me of sumthin... to get sum rest coz last year was a bit hectic for me.. to realize that we are not always surrounded by happiness... and the important thing is that we are nuthin in front of God...

it's been 9 days now.. since i got this stoopid chicken pox which ruin the whole plan i made! I was supposed to be already in Jakarta now, but at this particular time i'm still stucked in my bloddy apt. I was supposed to attend my best friends wedding ceremony and wear the dress i designed, but at this particular time im still wearing my pyjamas. I was supposed to be in the hairdresser to do ma hairdo, but at this particular time, i even let my hair dry without even comb it....
huaaaaaaaaaaaa im suffering from chicken pox! damn chicken pox!
